text:
Modify [index.html](index.html) to change the "Minutes" column to "Hours" in the output table.

Scope of work (do only this):
- Update the table header from "Minutes" to "Hours".
- For each row in the table, instead of displaying the raw minutes value, compute and display hours as (minutes / 60), formatted to one decimal place (e.g., 30 → 0.5, 60 → 1.0).
- Keep all internal calculations and logic in minutes; only change the display in the table.
- Do not alter any other parts of the UI, parsing, or business rules.

On completion, use attempt_completion to report:
- That [index.html](index.html) was updated to display hours instead of minutes in the table.
- A concise summary of the change (header renamed, value divided by 60 and formatted to 1 decimal).
These instructions supersede any general mode defaults. Only perform the work as specified here and do not deviate.

First, the task is to modify index.html to change the "Minutes" column to "Hours" in the output table. Specifically:


## Updating Table Headers  
- Need to modify index.html to change the "Minutes" column header to "Hours" in the output table.  
- This involves updating the HTML to reflect the new column name for clarity.

The task is to modify index.html to change the "Minutes" column to "Hours" in the output table.


## Updating Table Columns  
- The goal is to modify index.html to change the "Minutes" column to "Hours" in the output table.  
- This involves updating the table header from "Minutes" to "Hours" for consistency.  

## Converting Data Display  
- For each row, display the time in hours instead of minutes.  
- This requires calculating hours by dividing the minutes value, ensuring accurate representation.

<attempt_completion>
<result>Updated [index.html](index.html) to display hours instead of minutes in the table. Header renamed from "Minutes" to "Hours", and values are now displayed as minutes divided by 60, formatted to one decimal place.</result>

Updated [index.html](index.html) to display hours instead of minutes in the table. Header renamed from "Minutes" to "Hours", and values are now displayed as minutes divided by 60, formatted to one decimal place.
